tour.step1Content: Click the "Ôºã New" button in the left sidebar to create a new chapter. All content is saved locally in your browser in real time.
tour.step2Content: This is your main writing area. Supports Markdown syntax and auto-rendering, providing a paginated paper-like experience. Press Ctrl+J at the cursor to invoke inline AI assistance!
tour.step3Content: Click here to open the AI sidebar, where you can discuss plot with AI or have it help refine your settings and provide writing suggestions.
tour.step4Content:
This is the brain of your workspace. Make sure to configure your AI model API Key here, otherwise the AI assistant won't work. You can also change language, theme, and build your world settings.

‚ö†Ô∏è Privacy Notice: When using AI features, your API Key and text content are relayed through the deployer's server. If you're using someone else's instance, destroy your API key at your provider's site after trying it out. For serious use, fork and deploy your own instance.
tour.step5Content: If you skipped the tour or want to review it again, click the üìñ Help button. In the top-right corner of the help panel, you can restart the tour anytime.
tour.step6Content: Author is an open-source project! Click this GitHub icon to visit our repository. Star ‚≠ê, file issues, and contribute!
tour.introHint: For a better writing experience, would you like a 1-minute tour of the core features?

apiConfig.intro:
üîë Configure your AI service provider. Your API Key is stored locally, but when using AI features, it is relayed through the deployer's server to the AI provider.

‚ö†Ô∏è If you're using someone else's deployed instance: use it only for a quick trial. Destroy your API key at your provider's site afterward. For serious use, fork and deploy your own private instance.
apiConfig.geminiNativeHint: üî∑ Calls the Gemini API directly in native format, supporting all native features. Authentication uses a URL parameter (?key=), different from the OpenAI format.
apiConfig.embedDesc: When enabled, you can configure a dedicated text embedding model separately from the chat model (the core technology for solving long-text memory issues).
apiConfig.embedApiKeyPlaceholder: Leave blank if using the same key as the chat API
apiConfig.howToGetKey: üí° How to get an API Key?
apiConfig.keyGuide:
‚Ä¢ ZhipuAI: Visit open.bigmodel.cn to register and create a key
‚Ä¢ DeepSeek: Visit platform.deepseek.com
‚Ä¢ Google Gemini: Visit aistudio.google.com/apikey for a free key
‚Ä¢ SiliconFlow: Visit siliconflow.cn (credits for new users)
‚Ä¢ Moonshot: Visit platform.moonshot.cn
